price: Svakoj vjerskoj zajednici propisali smo vjerozakon prema kojem se trebala vladati, i ne dozvoli, nikako, da se s tobom o tome raspravljaju. Ti pozivaj svom Gospodaru jer ti si, uistinu, na Pravom putu.
arabic: لِّكُلِّ أُمَّةٖ جَعَلۡنَا مَنسَكًا هُمۡ نَاسِكُوهُۖ فَلَا يُنَٰزِعُنَّكَ فِي ٱلۡأَمۡرِۚ وَٱدۡعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَۖ إِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ هُدٗى مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: likulli ummatin jaʿalnā mansakan hum nāsikūhu falā yunāziʿunnaka fī al-amri wa-ud'ʿu ilā rabbika innaka laʿalā hudan mus'taqīmin
translations: So let them not dispute with you
So let them not dispute with you
